item.title: CLF
item.description: score:69 Chances: Cleveland-Cliffs has ratified a new labor contract with the United Steelworkers for its Northshore Mining Operations, ensuring labor stability. The company is actively involved in bid attempts and negotiations, indicating an interest in strategic expansion. Cleveland-Cliffs has the exclusive rights to bid for U.
